page.title: 11FAIRLIGHT ACTIVITIES ESUSSEX
page.content:
Social activities in Fairlight, East Sussex, mostly take place in the Village Hall, which is in the centre of the village, next to St. Peter's Church.
A pre-school playgroup is held there twice a week from 9.30 to ll.45am by local mothers for children under five years old.
Other interest group meetings held weekly at the Village Hall are; air rifle, dance and social, table tennis, and the Fairlight Players who put on productions in the Autumn and Spring.
The Literary Society meets at 3pm on alternate Wednesdays from October to March. The County Library visits the Village Hall twice weekly on Monday and Friday from 2 to 3.30pm.
